name: Super Circuit Silver
description:
An unusual car racing game. It's entirely free and you can play it directly in your web browser without downloading anything. It contains (currently) 30 colorful and varied racetracks with varying levels of difficulty. You can use items such as a propeller that lets you fly and makes you faster, fireballs that chase your opponents and snowflakes that can freeze a car.

The controls are very simple:

  • use the arrow keys to drive your car.
  • press the space bar to use an item.
  • press the control key to jump (jumping is never mandatory but it can be useful to take shortcuts).
  • press R to respawn on the track (useful when you fell off and want to respawn quickly).
  • press the escape key to pause the game.
